description: I. Letter dated 29/04/2009 from Ed Balls MP to Brian Lamb (Chair, Special Educational Consortium) regarding improving information for parents of children with special educational needs and disabled children. 2 p. II. Letter dated 29/04/2009 from Brian Lamb (Chair, Special Educational Consortium) to Ed Balls MP regarding complaints from parents of children with special educational needs. 3 p.
department: Dept for Children, Schools and Families
